title: backstage release v0.57.1
---

In this release:
The following filters were added to the Deployments page:
- "Status";
- "Label".
The following filters were added to the Clusters page:
- "Release";
- "App version";
- "Kubernetes version";
- "Region";
- "Status";
- "Provider";
- "Label".
The "codename" field was removed from the Installation details page.
See [./docs/releases/v0.57.1-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.57.1-changelog.md) for more information.
